articles.description: The Chase fans were left distracted after Paul Sinha revealed a picture of a recent group call that featured all the Chasers. In the snap Shaun unveiled his muscly arms
articles.content:

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Siegfried & Roy: Magician Siegfried Fischbacher dies aged 81 - Sky News
articles.description: Siegfried Fischbacher and Roy Horn were world renowned for their Las Vegas magic shows involving white lions and tigers.

articles.title: Dan Stevens says Judi Dench's reaction to 'Cats' was too sweary to repeat - NME
articles.description: Dan Stevens has said Judi Dench's reaction to 'Cats' contained too many expletives to be repeated, adding that the star was "pretty mad"
articles.content:
Dan Stevens has said Judi Dench’s reaction to Cats was “full of expletives”.
The actor, who stars opposite Dench in Blithe Spirit, relayed his co-star’s memories of the shoot on Tom Hooper’s live-ac… [+1384 chars]

articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: Tintin cover art sells for record-breaking €3.2m - The Guardian
articles.description: Hergé’s original artwork for Le Lotus Bleu was rejected as too expensive to reproduce in 1936 and given to editor’s son, who kept it in a drawer for decades
articles.content: A rejected Tintin cover illustrated by Hergé that was gifted to a child and kept in a drawer for decades has set a new world record as the most expensive comic book artwork, selling at auction for 3.… [+2459 chars]
